description: A dropdown menu consisting of a button to open the menu and a list of menu items. Clicking on a menu item will result in navigating to the provided URL or notifying the parent component via the @click event.

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the dropdown - Small, Medium or Large.

props.name: model
props.description: A list of menu items to render in the dropdown menu.

events.name: click
events.description: emitted when the user clicks on a menu item.
